document.heading: District of Columbia Tissue Bank Act Amendment of 1980

history.narrative: Law 3-145, the “District of Columbia Tissue Bank Act Amendment of 1980,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-312. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 16, 1980, and September 30, 1980, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 14, 1980, it was assigned Act No. 3-266 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
